biography: Olli, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a unique blend of enthusiasm and quiet determination to the competition. Representing Hirsala Golf, Olli is known amongst his peers for his somewhat eccentric love for the game of golf, bordering on obsession. He is known to be a die hard Bryson Dechambeau fan, going as far as trying to emulate his swing and on-course demeanor.

Having graced the greens of the Hector Trophée on eight previous occasions, Olli is gearing up for his ninth appearance in 2025. His experience is evident, marked by a victory in the Hector Trophée and an individual Victor trophy, achievements that speak volumes of his skill and competitive spirit.

Beyond the accolades, it's Olli's unwavering dedication to the sport and his meticulous approach to each game that truly define him. While he may keep to himself for the most part, he is always up for a quick chat about golf! Competitors and spectators alike eagerly anticipate his performance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
